Dachande's Robot mode is that of a Predator, the mask opens to reveal his o=
ld face.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: CYBERWOLF4 
  To: nbwrpg@e=
groups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, December 24, 2000 8:12 PM
  Subject: Re: Tripre=
dacus (Predacons should read)


  So who's gonna bring in the bots to trans=
form into predators?
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: dachande 
=
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Sunday, December 24, 2000 8:01 AM
   =
 Subject: Re: Tripredacus (Predacons should read)


    I love those movies=
, the Destron base is named Sulaco and LV-426, both from Aliens. And Dachan=
de had a Alien beast mode, so does Jynx and Praetorian and the Four Nightma=
res will soon.
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: CYBERWOLF4 
=
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Sunday, December 24, 2000 12:05 P=
M
      Subject: Re: Tripredacus (Predacons should read)


      What's wit=
h the "Alien" reference?

      Nostromo was Ripleys first ship.
        --=
--- Original Message ----- 
        From: dachande 
        To: nbwrpg@egro=
ups.com 
        Sent: Saturday, December 23, 2000 5:13 PM
        Subject:=
 Tripredacus (Predacons should read)


        Yanshosh and I, so far, are =
roleplaying these guys. When they combine they are under each of our contro=
l, but make sure to read the posts of the others so they know what is going=
 on.

        ::Sea Clamp/Cicadon/Ramhorn::

            The infamous membe=
rs of the Tripredacus Council had learned of what was going on on past Eart=
h. They decided that it was nessary for their personal intervention. Prepar=
ing a ship to leave they had a crew of about forty bots, none with Beast Mo=
des. They themselves had reengineered their bodies to accomadate Beast Mode=
s and a Gestalt.
            The ship, Nostromo, left the dock. It created =
a Transwarp conduit and went through. Soon they were all through. Sea Clamp=
 was at the helm, Cicadon was at the Navagation, and Ramhorn was manning th=
e weapons systems. Almost all of the lights had gone out, all that was on w=
ere red warning lights, which would make it difficult for anybody to see. T=
he crew had been eradicated, no chance for rebellion. But, smartly, their S=
parks had not been extinguised, they had been stored in small capsules for =
later use. Tripredacus had been looking for the last remaining ones when th=
ey saw something they did not expect. The Ark. In Space. They knew this was=
 a great chance, but the last of the remianing Predacons attacked them at t=
hat point. They did not have the chance to destroy the Ark. But they would.=
 The last of the rebels had been ejected from the ship.
            The Nos=
tromo had a easy landing. Tripredacus dismanteled the thruster system, Sea =
Clamp spoke up in a raspy voice. "No one goes home."
            "Agreed," =
The other two said. They decided to look for the other Predacons on this pl=
anet, and begin their plan of the destruction of the Ark, and the Autobots.=






          eGroups Sponsor
